column4: When I run ubuntu from the live CD, and I play the game Armagetron Advanced, the fps is the same as it is on Windows, but when I install ubuntu, the fps on the game is too low for it to be played well.  Is there anybody who can help me?
I have an integrated intel graphics card in a laptop if that helps
go to System > Preferences > Appearance [[ Visual Effects ]]
it is worth trying.. set it to normal, or none, and try armagetron again
